title: Twins of Ages: The Egyptian Curse
description: Bryson and Connor are troubled by the disappearance of their parents two years ago while on an excursion to Egypt. Could they still be alive? Little did they know that the search for answers would engulf them into a dark world of brotherhood, treachery, deceit, and betrayal. A portal to the past has unleashed a dark prince deadset on recovering the one artifact that will help regain his rightful place on the throne and his quest for world domination. Can the boys decipher the clues, navigate the perils hidden within the Egyptian temples, and safely recover the treasured artifact before it falls into the wrong hands? The clock is ticking!!
author: Reifort Blash
